resources.string:
Welcome !!!
This app contains more than 170 quotes from various historical figures, as seen in video game series "Call of Duty" upon mission completion or during game over screens.

===
This app is fan made and non-commercial. All the rights to "Call of Duty" series belong to Activision and the game developers.
===
Background music - "Final Boss" by Myuu
===
If you like the app, please consider rating it on Play Store :D
